website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price point for a softbox style of flash diffuser that is compatible with most hot shoe flash units.
pros: Folds down to a flat size, so you can carry it anywhere in a camera bag
Will fit around the end of an external flash unit tightly, preventing light leakage
Although it's made more for photographers working in a studio, its design is simple enough that almost anyone can attach and use it successfully
cons: Smaller than some other softbox style diffusers and only one size offered

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to my tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding tool to prevent hot spots that are formed by the regular flash configuration! I highly recommend the softbox to any photographer. Check out the attached photo for an example of what a photo I shot looks like. The flash is aimed directly at the model from close range without creating any blown out areas.
customer_reviews.author: C.L. Triggs

customer_reviews.title: Works okay for tight, close-up shots.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for up-close shots on or off-camera, however the soft light is still somewhat tight due to the size. That said, I've still managed to capture some decent portraits mounting this to my SB-700 flash off-camera when augmenting this with a reflector 90°, with the fash turned slightly offset from my subject toward said opposing reflector. See attached portrait of my daughter (flash with the NEEWER 6x8" Softbox 45° to the right, and silver reflector 45° to the left).
customer_reviews.author: Rick J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Sticks straight out with no drooping. Screens and filters my flashes so they come out much more flattering. It was overdoing in for close ups but this soft box makes me flash actually useable to shoot people with. No more over exposed shots, I don’t think I’ll ever want to take it off, it’s really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It does it job but build quality is meh
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't want to 100% fully open up so it doesn't give me full confidence that it doesn't affect the light output. But for it's price it does it job, however I wonder if they could add a springy material so it pops open would be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: George Colgrove

customer_reviews.title: So easy to travel with and such amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I definitely love it, I just got it and on the first try I was able to get some beautiful shots.
customer_reviews.author: Luis rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful flash attachment
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item that makes using my flash so much better. Softens the light to prevent overexposures without effecting the way I use it. Great size, folds to fit right into my camera bag so I don't need to carry anything extra when I go out. Attaches in seconds and all at a low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I quite like using this mini softbox on my speedlight. It's so easy to pull out and attach and folds up neatly so you can store it away in your camera sack. It works incredibly well for such a simple design.
customer_reviews.author: pekarek

customer_reviews.title: All good with this hood.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it will fit all speed light flashes, so I'd say it's versatile. Great size, not too big or anything. Not bulky. Folds down real small. You can store it without taking up any space really. Great job.
customer_reviews.author: caster

customer_reviews.title: Must have diffuser especially for macro photography
customer_reviews.text: I use it for action figure photography. It diffuses my flash well and evens out the light when shooting 3.75in objects, even in low light.
customer_reviews.author: J.M. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy go for some good product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this few month back and used it in quite a few occasion. To be honest with or without this picture doesnot matter much. The picture quality is quite similar. It suppose to soften the flash which is not happening. I dont recommend this product for Portrait photography. If you have TTL Flash and you know how to bounce the light that should be good. You dont need this in you camera bag. Its not going to make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bijoy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my off brand flash perfectly. Definitely not a waste of money. Really good to have if you cant use your softbox lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, still on the fence with longevity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was inexpensive and I needed something to soften my speedlight when shooting some band portraits at a venue. This definitely softens the light and does it’s job, so for price and what it is I’m definitely happy and I would recommend it. That being said, I don’t know how much I’ll continue using it, I may reinvest in a slightly more expensive round one (I believe Neewer sells a 12” circular version). Though this does soften the light a bit, it’s small so it only spreads the soft light out so much. It’s better than nothing, for sure, but a larger diffuser surface obviously allows for wider spread of light.
customer_reviews.author: Rad AstronautTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: If you hate directions this softbox is for you!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice add on and has the added benefit of being a puzzle. If you like to figure stuff out on your own with no assistance of any kind you have to try this product. You will happily move the softbox this way and that, tugging on all the neat velcro straps, until you feel the satisfaction from all the problem solving involved with getting it attached to your speedlight. If you hate reading the directions then you're in luck! This unit has no directions of any kind so you'll have many a happy hour of head scratching. It's like happy puzzle time with a functional softbox included.
customer_reviews.author: IrishPuterGeek

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price, great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't expecting anything amazing for the price, and just wanted something cheap to try out different lighting techniques. This is reasonably well built, and works very well with my Nikon SB-600 flash. It has a rubberized strip of hook-sided velcro that fits nicely around your flash, and that I generally keep on my flash even when not using my soft-box. The product is a little clumsy to take on and off, and is not very well suited for rapid on the fly swaps. If you're looking to try out soft boxes for macro, still life, food, or portraits this is a great option that won't break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: ChinookOutdoorsTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It definitely does the job - softening and generally more pleasing photos.
customer_reviews.text: 1/4/17 Just tried a few shots last night. It definitely does the job - softening and generally more pleasing photos. It makes my cheap Bower flash much more consistent. A few concerns: 1. It is a pain to put on / take off. The Velcro is TOO strong. You need really need the flash off the camera to get it right - otherwise risk damaging the shoe mount. 2. Need to step up your flash a bit of course to compensate for the lost light. 3. Storing is in a camera bag will probably require removal. I wish it was collapsible and would tuck away while mounted
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Moderte softening at best.
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's ok, but build quality is pretty lack luster. I use these to soften my speedlights just a touch (and it's really very barely noticeable at anything over 4 feet or so). If you're looking to really soften your light, then this isn't big enough to really accomplish that. I would suggest a medium or large size Flash Bender or similar product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wesala

customer_reviews.title: Fits the flash just fine and adds such a nice soft light to portraits
customer_reviews.text: Fits the flash just fine and adds such a nice soft light to portraits. Very useful for outdoor photo shoots when you don't want to drag around a light set up. Collected a little dirty on the front even though it's always put away in my camera bag but still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: CA1181

customer_reviews.title: Great quality = value
customer_reviews.text: This mini softbox extends the usability of my strobes. The collar that fits onto your flash is of surprisingly good quality - and easily, snugly, securely fits over the flash head. The interior has a nice silver reflective surface to make the most of the light. Comes with handy, zippered pouch which will help protect this accessory really well. Great value for the money - especially compared to competitive, well known flash accessories.
customer_reviews.author: PhilaPhil

customer_reviews.title: Give it a shot. Would not hurt to have one in bag.
customer_reviews.text: It fit very easily over my light. Had honestly felt need to use once (practicing). Much better than a bare on camera flash for SURE. Could do well for more review if I had more need for testing it. I had bought it when 1st purchasing camera gear and felt I needed EVERYTHING I could see that would fit what I owned. My fault/anxiety, but, does NOT take away from this product. Get one just in case you have indoor holiday pics and may want one. Sometimes I think I may have need for softer light and have no white wall to bounce flash off of. This little gadget might just be perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Huie D.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I saw someone at a 1940's themed party and saw how their pictures came out and had to get my hands on one. So glad I did. I can now venture into low light areas and take professional grade pictures without washing out my subjects with direct flash. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Sturdy, effective.
customer_reviews.text: This modifier works pretty good. My only complaint is that I cannot use it on my Vivitar 285 flashes. So I spent $15 and got a similarly powered Sunpak. I have used this on Vivitar 2800s, 283s, and the Sunpak flash I have. It drops the flash about two stops and isn't great for distance use, as is the case with most flash modifiers. I use this with an L bracket to get the flash off the camera and to the side. I will often hand hold up up and left if I need more off camera effect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hammor

customer_reviews.title: Good softbox - needs longer velcro strap
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job for outdoor direct-angle portrait photography. It produces a very nice, even and softened light. It stows flat and is easy to handle. The only complaint would be that the velcro strap provided is about an inch too short. It is barely long enough to fit around the Pentax AF-540FGZ flash. The overlap it provides is only a centimeter or two. Update: I subsequently picked up a pair of other light covers that have an integrated stretch-strap that works much better. I highly recommend them instead:
customer_reviews.author: TK-22007

customer_reviews.title: I love the Neewer !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Neewer every time I like them more they have very accessible products and of very good quality and the truth is that each product that I buy from them is an excellent quality and this is one of the most ones, it is comfortable and I always have it in my camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dumaris Brioso PHOTOGRAPHY

customer_reviews.title: Installing it properly is key/important!
customer_reviews.text: After I properly figured out how to place this on my external flash, I took it out for a spin (a kid's birthday party) and was pleasantly surprised by its durability (first timer with a soft box). It does not fall off no matter your pace or movement. Once you remove it from your flash, fold it and place it in your medium to large camera bag. It hides away quite nicely. As for its purpose, I love the quality it brings to my photos. I use this item for portrait photography more often than none.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M.

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: What I expected, and for the price...maybe it's even better than I expected. It took me a couple of attempts to figure out how to put it on my flash, as it does not come with any form of instructions. The band that holds it in place goes around the flash unit first, non slip plastic side down. Then you place the velcro tabs on the softbox itself over the band. It does a nice job of softening and defusing the flash. It folds up nice and flat so it's easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Chased by a BearTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, velcro situation is a little odd
customer_reviews.text: It comes with velcro that you loop around the flash, then you attach the velcro on the softbox to that. It's kind of weird because the first velcro isn't really anchored to the flash so the softbox can still move forward and backward and maybe even off (with the velcro you put around the flash). If you plan to use this often, it may be better to just buy sticky velcro tabs that you permanently attach to the flash. Anyway, besides that, this works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: BG Boyd

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great. really softens highlights from flash-- tried taking pics with and without and it is very effective--saw a very clear difference in results. great price, so cheap its not worth even trying to make a homemade one. other reviewers made me a little cautious but I am glad I tried it-- I have never had it fall off my flash, even when walking around outdoors with it. don't understand the negative reviews about it being hard to attach. the sticky rubbery side of the velcro band faces the surface of the flash. the velcro side to the velcro of the softbox.
customer_reviews.author: V.V.GO-12

customer_reviews.title: You almost get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a diffuser, but does not stay on well. Difficult to use in anything but a studio setting with a tripod mounted flash. Will require some gaffer's tape to keep it in place. Spend a little more and get something you can actually use. You will spend more time fiddling with this thing. It convienently folds pretty flat, so when you get aggravated with it you can quickly stuff it in a back pocket if you can resist the urge to whip it across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Cute little toy that I added on to order but really worthless. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: W4SGA

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this soft box to go with my Neewer TT560 Flash Speedlite they both work wonderfully together! I was super surprised by how well they worked. Really nice for the price. The softbox comes with a bag to keep it clean and folds down flat for easy travel. Try it out!
customer_reviews.author: David Young

customer_reviews.title: This rocks I bought 2 of these I’m so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: These are bad ass there built well collapse for easy storage great for photographers everywhere while traveling at a convention or even just model photography this product kicks ass
customer_reviews.author: johnodd

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price, not perfect but works well
customer_reviews.text: This fits quite well on my Canon 430EX flash. Not as good as a large soft box but it does do the job to help diffuse the light from the flash. Really quite good quality for the price. My only gripe is that it didn't include any instructions, so it took about 15 minutes to figure out how to mount the diffuser on the flash. [Hint: wrap the velcro strap around the flash first, velcro side out, and then attach the diffuser to that with its velcro flaps at the opening.] I love getting inexpensive camera gear that's every big as good as the expensive name brand stuff!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: but I do like this softbox
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Neewer flash instead of the name brand flash. Then, I bought this softbox to diffuse the strong, sharp light of the flash. I used to use a very expensive diffuser, but I do like this softbox. The light is softer and more even. You could even bounce this light off a ceiling. It won't work if you need a 360 degree diffused light. But, for a direct lighting situation, it is small and saves in some instances from having to lug around a large softbox.
customer_reviews.author: ifr

customer_reviews.title: Works great - be careful with removing strong Velcro from flash unit though.
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as advertised - and you can open the top/bottom flaps for different effects. Good for close work. The caution is that when installed correctly (velcro tape wrapped around flash, attachment of fixture to flash body) it's quite possible to put a lot of strain on the flash base by taking it off while attached to the camera. I actually caused the base on my flash to come apart - fortunately I was able to repair that, but be a bit careful when taking the Softbox off and take the flash off the camera first.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, put the Velcro onto your Speedlite first and then attach the softbox to the velcro. I love this softbox so much. This is useful when taking simple everyday pictures and not wanting to intimidate people (like family) with fancier and bigger equipment. It is easy and quick to put on. It does soften light and make it gentler. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I use these for weddings and general low light shooting. The diffuse the flash very well for being so small and portable. They have a velcro/rubbery strip that prevents it from moving when in use. I have 2 of them and will always try to use them in lieu of straight flash.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Ideal size for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after I saw a friend using one and he was so happy with it, I had to try it for myself. For the price, this soft box is an excellent deal and accessory for my flash. Mini and compact so it's the ideal size to travel with. I used it today and I had two photo shoots outdoors. The weather was dreary and over cast but this illuminated the shot so beautifully and made the lighting a lot softer. I have already strongly recommended this and have shared it with all the members in my facebook photography group. Can't rave about it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Staub

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I use this mini soft box for taking macro shots for my graphics and it works lovely with my flash. It fits on over the flash bulb and doesn't fall off no matter how much I point down with it. Super secure fastening. We had a chance to compare a larger soft box under the exact same circumstances. The modification of the lighting is quite great, the softness is remarkable. This is an excellent compromise for diffusion that's more practical in size and function. Folds up into a tiny envelope that's easy to carry and pack.
customer_reviews.author: arro

customer_reviews.title: A game changer
customer_reviews.text: Getting this little diffuser is a life saver and game changer with my photography. I do business head shots at the clients' location and with this add on, I don't need to bring a whole studio with me. I can either put it on my camera or a speedflash on a stand, and it works great! Saves me from carrying so weight from gear that I would otherwise have to setup since it's so compact and eliminates the need of having a large soft box stand in the way. I will be buying more soon for my other flashes so I can use them all at once with covers. .
customer_reviews.author: Jake Jewell

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the budget portrait photographer
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the results I got with this softbox. Compared to a picture taken of my parents taken with the bare flash, the pic using this product produced more even lighting, and more realistic skin tones. It fit my lens easily. Inexpensive, lightweight, effective. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: rashhangover

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I gave it four stars because it does what it is supposed to do - diffuse a flash. It looks quite big and bulky though when you put it on the flash, and might be reserved for occasions where your not able to set up a full soft box in a studio type of setting. The way that it is attached to the flash is pretty interesting, and for those of you who need additional information: you strap the small strap around the flash first, and then velcro the soft box back onto the strap. I would recommend this product for someone who needs a soft flash but doesn't want to do a full setup.
customer_reviews.author: SnakeB

customer_reviews.title: and I liked it enough to keep it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by mistake, as I was doing a lot of shopping for speedlite modifiers and clicked "Buy It Now" without paying enough attention. But I let the order complete anyway because this is so inexpensive, and I liked it enough to keep it. It's small, but it has it uses.
customer_reviews.author: filmyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cool item!
customer_reviews.text: Works to spread and diffuse light from a flash. It works great! It really improves the look of a flash-lit subjects by smoothing hot spots and reflections. I've used it on a couple of events, and the flash pictures were outstanding. I have to get a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Marshall

customer_reviews.title: my better choice now
customer_reviews.text: Simple flash diffusor, over the head placement with this small soft box. It works just fine and is effortless to use, just slip on, tighten, and I'm good to go. The best part about it for me is that it folds very flat and can be slid into the side of my camera bag without taking up almost any space at all. So compact, much better to travel with this and my flash. My giant soft box is now a thing of the past now that I have this mini version in my life. The results are amazing and the lighting is significantly softer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mapfumo

customer_reviews.title: I love using it
customer_reviews.text: This really softens the flash. I love using it. The down side is if you have it pointing straight as shown in the stock photo, it blocks the red light that the flash projects to help the camera focus. But if you are using this, you are probably looking for a softer light and angling the flash up helps with that. It stays in place fairly well. A far more advanced photography friend of mine was really impressed and said she was going to order one. I am looking at adding a second light and will be buying this for that second light.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pelzel

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt fit the flash right, very loose and i have to constantly keep putting back in place. The most annoying thing is that if the softbox is not on the right place, then it cuts off the flash and only a portion of the picture has a flash and the other is dark. If the softbox stays where its supposed to be, then yes it does its job right. Problem is keeping it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Meteoro

customer_reviews.title: Small, portable, and works much better than I ever imagined
customer_reviews.text: Super small soft box. Works great with a flash for much softer images. Used for graduation pictures and my pictures came out better than everybody else with a camera. Very impressed also great for pets and does not scare them off like normal flash.
customer_reviews.author: DF the Grey

customer_reviews.title: IT FITS GREAT. NEVER FALLS OFF.
customer_reviews.text: My first review ever on Amazon. Had to write this after seeing the bad reviews because people couldn't get the mini soft box to stay on. I thought too that I had bought something potentially useful but junky overall. BUT I went back and read the reviews and realized I was putting the soft box on wrong. Look all, there is velcro INSIDE the mini soft box. You put the velcro like wrist band FIRST on your flash. THEN slide the mini soft box onto the wristband like thingy. It works excellent. This stuff is revolutionizing my photography. Thank you Neewer.
customer_reviews.author: Mauidreams

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful
customer_reviews.text: High quality diffusion with this reflective soft cover over my flash. So ideal for shooting in darker environments like the wedding hall I took it to last weekend. I got great lighting with it even though the dance floor was dark, the bright flashes came out much softer so that it wouldn’t be so harsh when shooting a bunch of people. The material is well made, I completely recommend it and it’s stretchy enough to fit most flashes.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Item for your toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Man, The difference this can make on your photos! I absolutely loved the soft light that this helps to provide straight off your camera. I used in a shoot last week and it worked wonderful! There is a strap that came with it (probably to tighten the box around your flash, but it seemed like it may have been missing a piece of Velcro to work properly as a strap. But it fit snug on my flash without any straps. I definitely recommend getting this wonderful little tool!
customer_reviews.author: zack watts

customer_reviews.title: Pkay, just not the best
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't perform like I thought is would as it is only good for really close-in portraits. I need to experiment more and maybe my experience will be better. The dome itself folds flat, but the opening area or the collar make the package much harder to carry in an already too full camera bag. It is a little flimsy and even with the sticky grip surface it still does not stay in place very well on my Canon 430EX. For the money, it is still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jack DTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I needed a diffuser for when I didn't want to carry gear with me. It doesn't compare with other diffusers that are bigger but that's because it's not that big. It does the job however, it makes the light source slightly larger and softens it a bit. Stays securely on my flash with elastic velcro
customer_reviews.author: BobertphotoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This works decently well considering how it has to be attached. The reason I only gave it the 4 stars is because of the way it attaches. It seems flimsy like it doesn't fit that well. He effects however are decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jazzygirl

customer_reviews.title: Quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I'm glad another reviewer showed how to attach this to the flash as it didn't come with instructions. The build quality is really nice even though it came in a flat pack and I wasn't sure what it was at first. The backfill openings are helpful especially for macro photography where most flashes cast a shadow or overshoot the close to lens subject. I'll be abusing this a lot and will update my review with further insights.
customer_reviews.author: Impact9

customer_reviews.title: Does work
customer_reviews.text: Although I have purchased Neewer's portable softbox equipment, it is not practical when traveling with my family. The softbox plays a very important role at all times. This mini softbox is a very necessary design! Its weight and volume are almost negligible. You don't need extra bags, there is room in the cam bag to put it in. The installation is also very simple, the position and tightness of the softbox are determined by an elastic band, which requires no skill at all. Once again, very necessary purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: You don't need this.
customer_reviews.text: ....I bought this when I first started shooting just to practice. You really don't need this thing at all if I'm being honest.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Smile
customer_reviews.text: If you not use to, but nice diffuser color gels come in handy. (Softens the light). With new cameras light meter. Adjustment
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice enough piece of gear, but it doesn't fit my flash very well, and the Velcro strap that is supposed to hold the flash box on isn't quite long enough to wrap all the way around well, and isn't strong enough to hold, once you get it barely stretched around. So that is disappointing. I taped mine on my flash head with duct tape while using it so it would stay in place! I was a little surprised at the poorer quality, because I like the Neewer speed light I own very much.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Attaches well to pretty much any flash unit without adhesives, very ingenious.  It folds flat, and is built sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This little soft box attaches well to pretty much any flash unit without adhesives, very ingenious. It folds flat, and is built sturdy. It is too small to really give much diffusion, with soft boxes bigger is better, but for macro work it is pretty nice, and small enough to travel with you in most any camera bag. Neewer also makes a 8"×12" soft box which also attaches with this ingenious system, I would advise to get that bigger model!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pixel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect softbox
customer_reviews.text: This cover creates soft, diffused lighting with my external camera flash in seconds. The silver interior lining increases contrast and bounces reflections so well. It fits my flash perfectly and it's simple to slip it on or off. Has a fastening strap built on to it for tight and snug holding so it doesn't slip off (when I don't want it to.) It's great for when I have my flash tilted down when I'm doing macro shots. Perfect accessory for any flash user.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Imhof

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This soft box really transforms the bright lighting from my flashes into soft strokes of glow. No blown out corners or harsh over exposure. Simply unfolds and attaches to the front of my flash by slipping it over the bulb part and stays connected on with the fastening tape and rubber non slip grip attached inside. The silver aluminizes and reflects well.The lining is really well stitched and durable and helps keep my flash dry in the rain. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Handy accessory
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how much of a difference using a diffuser would make on taking some of my pictures with my external flash but by golly does this cover do the trick. I'm completely blown away by how much this soft box cover works with my flash, completely takes the brightness and keeps it bright but also makes the lighting a ton more softer than it would be using it without. I like the way it folds flat for storage, I can easily tuck it away anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Naseath

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This mini Soft Box works quiet well with my Nikon and Yongnuo flash units. It is easy to setup and use. I like the fact that I can fold it flat and fit it in my camera bag much easier than the plastic molded diffusers. Of course I wont use this for every application but it does a decent job of spreading the light evenly as well as softening the flash reasonably well. In all, a pretty good deal for what it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not the best light diffusion source
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product and would not buy it again. Pros: 1. Very small 2. Attaches very easily. Cons: 1. Does not diffuse light very well.
customer_reviews.author: Range

customer_reviews.title: ... use this with my TT560 Speedlite and it works wonderfully! The light is nice and soft and
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my TT560 Speedlite and it works wonderfully! The light is nice and soft and, when you're done, the whole thing folds nice and neat into your camera bag with no fuss. Very durable and priced great!
customer_reviews.author: Khris Reaves

customer_reviews.title: External flash soft box
customer_reviews.text: Turn your flash into a soft light . Velcros to a wide sortmen of external flashes . Has an extra flap inside to dim your flash . Works great for what it is .
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soft box cover to take pictures with at my school dance it was amazing for it! Compact and portable, which is great cause I needed something I can move with that won't slip or fall off my speedlite. The lighting was really low but this worked ideally with my flash. My shots came out perfect and the diffused softness really complimented the vibe I was going for. I was able to get really great shots for yearbook thanks to this accessory, I'm gonna tell my photography club all about it!
customer_reviews.author: Ke Dong

customer_reviews.title: Won't Open Like the One in the Picture!
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to strap around my Neewer Speedlite. And then, won't fully open like the one in the picture. Permanently folded?
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ringler

customer_reviews.title: I’ll keep it, but...
customer_reviews.text: It diffuses, but dampens A LOT of the light. It was cheap so I’ll keep it in my bag. But I doubt I’ll use it much. Bouncing the light from my speedlight off a card or wall worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Works, but no real mounting ability.  Weird strap that doesn't match anything.
customer_reviews.text: Came with some sort of velcro mounting strap that doesn't match anything. No apparent way to mount it on the flash - just slide it on. That's ok and it works, but I hate having "mystery pieces" that make no sense. Doesn't diffuse as much as I would like to see. May have to add an oval of more opaque material in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick Berger

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: I absolutley love this! I don't use my speed light now without it! Diffuses my flash beautifully and illuminates subjects without harsh dark shadows. It's lightweight, sturdy, and folds up easily. It's well made and fits all of my speed lights. This is made just like a standard soft box only a mini version. It has changed my photography for the better! I plan to buy more in the future for backups and so all my flashes have one.
customer_reviews.author: JUNGYONG KIM

customer_reviews.title: So cute a softbox
customer_reviews.text: Its effect is similar to that of a large softbox, but it is more suitable for close-up shooting. It is also good to shoot night scenes. The light is much softer and the range of light distribution becomes a little bit wider. I guess the material should be nylon cloth, which is very light and foldable, and super convenient to carry. Personally, the portraits taken with this mini softbox are better looking and it can reduce the problem of many red eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and stable
customer_reviews.text: This softbox is a game changer! I am not a professional photographer, but i really enjoy it as a hobby. With this, my indoor pictures have drastically improved. The strap to hold it on is very well made and will not fall off when installed properly. The strecthy opening makes it very easy to use on both of my current camera set-ups so there is almost no time spent installing it. Great purchase for someone looking to go to the next level in photography!
customer_reviews.author: Rajendra Purimetla

customer_reviews.title: Folds up nicely to easily fit in my camera bag
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive little gadget is a dream. Spreads the light perfectly to avoid harsh shadows or the dreaded "dear in headlights" look. I use it for outdoor portraits in bright sunlight and indoors when in a pinch. It is well made and durable. Folds up nicely to easily fit in my camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Mini cute softbox
customer_reviews.text: The softbox creates a uniform illumination through the diffuse flash, and this mini softbox shows more! The method is simple, just unfold the diffuser and fasten the straps to the front, and the first installation requires the technique of finding the right position of the fastening strap. My favorite is its volume, which basically does not take up space after folding. For outing shooting is the most suitable! Recommend everyone to try it!
customer_reviews.author: paris daniels

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fits on my flash
customer_reviews.text: This cheap diffuser solved this problem that the flash is too intense for indoor portraits. It is great for home use. Comes with an elastic band, just install it around the flash head and adjust it to the right position. This may not be suitable for a very large or small flash, but it should work fine for any normal size flash. Think about its price, you will always get something. I personally am very happy with this little thing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy go buy the Gary Fong
customer_reviews.text: Just folds up doesn’t stay where needs to be, flimsy, only tried to use it like 3 times and got annoyed I’ll stick to my Gary Fong!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Sticky friction on the inside and velcro strap on the outside. The strap wraps around and snaps to tighten around my flash so it doesn't slide off. I can have my flash angles up or down and it doesn't slide. Keeps a tight seal and the silver lining inside reflects it out brighter yet comes through the cover with such soft lighting, that's so much more flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Taaffe

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is really made for a larger flash. I purchased it to use with my Speedlight SB-400, and while it does kind of fit, it is really made for a larger flash. I like that it folds flat and fits into a slip pocket on my bag. I made pictures with and without it, and it really makes a difference by softening the light. I would recommend this for the larger flash options, but for something like the SB-400, a diffuser will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fits with my flash!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fits with my flash, excellent light coverage and significantly makes the flashes much softer and less harsh than when I was using my flash before I got this. Stays in place with the non slip rubber grip inside the cover but I really admire that they sewed velcro straps onto it for even more holding it on there with even more security. Stays on where it's supposed and does an amazing job at diffusing.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia marks

customer_reviews.title: Nice softbox
customer_reviews.text: I had a fellow photographer recommend this to me when I saw her using and asked her about it. This is perfect for taking night life pictures. I still get the power of my flash but I can cut the light more diffusely for no overexposure when doing closeups. Works well with my flash during the day time as well especially on dreary overcast days, the effect comes out really nicely with the weather. Collapsible and really easy to slip on my flash.
customer_reviews.author: Baez Cedeño Jedy

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quite fit the Neewer VK750 I bought it to go with - a little small. Doesn't want to really "pop out" straight. That said, I used it to shoot a few pix with the speedlight on top of my camera, and it worked well enough I'd take it if I were taking my speedlight along on a trip. If you're going to point your flash at your subject, it's better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product For the Cost
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the cost. Obviously, it's not high grade, and the design has some flaws (the attachment isn't all that great), but again...for the cost, I don't feel like I can complain too much about it. If you are a photographer in need of a softbox, but don't have the big $$ to go with the more expensive brands, then this a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: It's better than shooting direct flash. It helps soften the light
customer_reviews.author: JonBenz

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to actually test the product out but just from trying to get it on my flash and struggling with that I'm giving it 3 stars. There are no instructions and I just tried to attempt to get it on and have it stay on which isn't working so well. I think if I was to use this by hand (no tripod) I think I would have issues with it falling off. I may just need to make a better makeshift velcro to get it to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Silivrenwolf

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my Altura lens and does exactly what it's supposed to do. I was a bit skeptical about it staying on the lens correctly, but the velcro strip has a sticky-yet-no-adhesive back on it that grips very tightly. The only problem I have is the looks I get from people wondering what's on top of my camera. It's hard to look cool with this thing :) Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice diffuser, easy to store in your bag
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times but it's easy to stash in my too-full bag and it really helps diffusing the light from the flash for portraits. Does it compare to an off camera diffuser on a stand? No, but if you are at a family gathering or similar, moving around and such, this is thing to have. Much more flattering light than the harsh flash. Will like to try it when using fill flash outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Barnabas O'Collins

customer_reviews.title: Beneficial for lighting quality.
customer_reviews.text: attaches easily to my light with the inner grip and velcro to wrap around it. somehow stays on even with me running around and shooting like a lunatic at the wedding I just shot with it at. the mini box cover worked extremely well to make the lighting from my flash a whole lot softer, which definitely comes in handy when you're shooting people like I do. beneficial for lighting quality.
customer_reviews.author: Doran

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I originally wanted to make myself a mobile diffuser for my flash and soon found it to be too much of a hassle. Then I was very happy to find this compact and low price gear sold online. This 15 cm little softbox totally fulfills my needs. It fits snuggly on my Nikon flash unit with the velcro strap and helps generate perfectly softened lighting. Ideal for my portrait shootings.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: The results are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something like this for awhile now and the results are amazing. Covers small areas and is perfect for one person or couple portraits, lights up faces and spaces very well & gives a very soft light that bounces through it nicely! If you looking for something handy and simple that will allow you to use your flash and still acheive soft lighting, I’m going to recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: M&J

customer_reviews.title: Always the simple solutions which are best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! It gives me a nice difuse lighting spread out over a wider area. It provides very complimentary lighting to every person I have shot using it. When you affix the velcro strap to you flash, this diffuser goes on and off fairly rapidly, and other than setting your flash at a slightly higher intensity is pretty mindless to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little diffuser at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I bought this to take better photos of my dog. He doesn't sit still long enough to use studio lights so I wanted something portable and easy to soften the flash and this does the trick. It's easy to attach and I love that you don't have to permanently adhere the velcro to your flash like I've seen on other diffusers.
customer_reviews.author: zomg

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight compact soft light diffuser
customer_reviews.text: While extremely light, it serves it's purpose well. It folds very flat (about the size of a half sheet notepad). Great for soft lighting effects. Attaches via a rubber backed Velcro strap the you wrap around the head of the flash with the Velcro up. The softbox has Velcro on the four side flaps that you attach to the Velcro strap. Excellent item for the camera flash bag !
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what it says it is. I wish it came with more filter options to layer on it. Future idea maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong with this Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Good craftsmanship, durable, well thought out features such as the rubber piping inside the sleeve which assists the defuser to stay on the flash with little to no movement (sliding up and down on the flash).
customer_reviews.author: RobbJ86

customer_reviews.title: Good addition for taking great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 4 stars for this reason -- I have the Nikon SB400 speed light and because the light sits so low on the camera, it was difficult to get the softbox to stay on the light. I was, however, able to rig something (a thick rubber band works well) and from that point forward, the unit worked extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: shutter bug1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: If You Have An External Flash This Is Worth It !!!! I Use The Neewer T560 !
customer_reviews.author: Affan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soft box
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful soft box attachment cover. Well sewn materials with leather exterior and the silver lined interior. Foldable and compact envelope design makes it easy to open or take off and store flat. Diffuses the flash and makes the lighting more even. Evens and improves my skin tone as well as reduces redness and blotches. Fits comfortably over my speedlite and is great to use mounted on my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Mata

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the light
customer_reviews.text: I gave it four stars instead of five because I had to rip it little a little bit to get this said on my light I ripped it on the threads but the Velcro will hold it together keep it on light. Is good because it tones down, the light so much is not as bright in-your-face it tones it down a little. I would recommend this cover because of work for me
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I use this all the time for shooting ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I use this all the time for shooting is shade. Provides great soft light and the light is still fairly focused, it doesn't disperse light as well as globe style diffuser. This is great for on camera use or off camera. I have also used it in a pinch for product photography and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: wholefoodpursuit

product_meta.title: Neewer 6 x 5 inches/15 x 12.5 centimeters Translucent Softbox for Canon Nikon and Other DSLR Cameras Flashes,Neewer TT560 TT850 TT860 NW561 NW670 VK750II Flashes
product_meta.description:
Professional Lighting Made Easy!

This is a portable and versatile softbox designed for
speedlites and flashes with a hotshoe. The softbox comes standard with an adjustable L-Shaped mounting bracket
which can fit practically any flash unit. By diffusing the flash, the softbox creates an even lighting that allows
you to capture picture-perfect shots. It will also reduce blemishes and improve skin tone contrast while
delivering super rich coloring. It's everything you need to produce studio like photography on a more
professional level.

Convenient And Effective

Simply unfold the diffuser and attach the front,
and you're ready to go! Stretch opening allows you to connect the diffuser to most shoe mount flashes.

Compatible With:

Nikon D7000 , D5100 , D5000 , D3100 , D3000 , D700 , D300 , D300S ,
D100 , D90 , D70 , D70S , D60 , D40 , D3 , D3S , D3X

Nikon SB-900 AF , SB-800 AF , SB-700 AF ,
SB-600 , SB-400 AF Neewer TT560 TT520 tt660 NW680 tt850 TT860 and Other DSLR Flashes

Canon : G1
X /600D /1D X / SX40 HS / SX150 IS /60D /550D /SX30 IS / G12 / SX130IS
feature_bullets: By diffusing the flash, the softbox creates an even lighting that allows you to capture picture-perfect shots
Converts the harsh light from flash to a softer, diffused light, while reducing shadows and softening hot spots
Simply unfold the diffuser and attach the fastening tapes front, and you're ready to go
Stretch opening allows you to connect the diffuser to most shoe mount flashes
Note: Camera and speedlight are NOT included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,928 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
